Experiment Method.Material Used: Patient-derived muscle biopsies and cell lines
Experiment Method.Readout Description: Analysis of LARP6 protein expression and localization in patient samples revealed truncated protein variants (p.G735Sfs*11) and altered phosphorylation patterns in the missense variant (p.G735S). Functional assays demonstrated impaired RNA processing and myogenic differentiation in cells harboring the c.2203del mutation.
Immunostaining showed abnormal nuclear localization of LARP6 in patient muscle fibers, correlating with the presence of the c.2203G>A mutation.
